attributes.action: LEGISLATE TO STANDARDISE ALL PLASTICS USED IN SUPERMARKETS YOGHURT POTS, MEAT TRAYS ETC SO ALL CAN BE RECYCLED, PRFERABLY BY RETURN TO SUPERMARKET
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local authorities with poor plastic recycling records frequently blame the difficulties caused by identifying & sorting the immense variety of plastics used in packaging. Total standardisation would solve the problem and make recycling cost effective. If supermarkets handled the returns with their empty lorries to depot: even more savings. Milk containers are standard, why not yoghurt pots, meat trays, margerine/butter containers, cosmetic containers (and lids)?

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters in the title of your petition; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
